name: Mantri Plast
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “Mantri Plast Private Limited”, are involved in manufacturing and exporting an array of Storage Classic Containers, Storage Contessa Containers.

Our Products: Storage Classic Containers, Storage Contessa Containers, Storage Super Seal Containers, Storage Crystal Containers, Frosty Buckets, Regular Buckets, Square Buckets, Storage Super Containers, Storage Super Fresh.

Application Areas: We are offering a wide range of plastic products to our valued clients, at highly reasonable prices. All the products offered by us find wide application in different packaging industries, offices, domestic households and other commercial establishments.

Our Team: We proudly acknowledge our team of competent and qualified professionals, who work in coordination with the clients to design widely applicable products. We hire these professionals through a rigorous recruitment process, which has a series of tests to check the capability and talent of the candidates.

Infrastructure: We have developed a capacious and sophisticated infrastructural set up which is spread across a sprawling area. This infrastructure has a vast manufacturing unit is well equipped with high end machinery and tools.

Our Quality Assurance: We are a quality conscious organization and are widely known for offering high quality products to our esteemed clients. The ultimate mission of our organization is to offer excellent quality products at reasonable prices. Our quality control unit actively supervises the entire manufacturing process, which ensures that high grade merchandise is offered to the clients.
